text: @realDonaldTrump I believe it’s actually called “Mourning in America”. It’s a great ad & poses the same questions most Americans have regarding the future of our country. Under your leadership, you failed at Coronavirus. I think you’ll find that truth on Election Day. #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate

- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
